3: Crisp, unguarded footsteps can be heard outside the mansion. The person seems to be unaware of Roland and Lamia's presence.
But that's still a sign, telling Roland no matter what he wants to do, he better be quick.
Tsk...! I'll just have to rush a little.
Roland locks the gate with force. Unfortunately, he cannot block the opening he left on the fence when he broke into the yard.
There is no doubt that the noises will catch the attention of the 'guest,' but Roland doesn't care.
Suspicious signs make people overthink. They can slow Cerberus down, redirecting their attention to unnecessary details.
—Which will create an opportunity for Roland.
Someone seems to have heard the loud noise and moves over from the other side of the house.
Eek! What are you doing...
Shh, our guest has arrived.
Time for the next step.
Um... What shall I do then?
I want you to stay outside the house and watch them. Let me know immediately if they are leaving.
As for me... I will check out what our 'guest' is here for.
What is it? I will let you know once I find out.
But I need someone to watch the house for me, to make sure nobody does anything outside my vision.
Um... I see.
Lamia jumps high above the house, then disappears.
Alright. I need to find somewhere to hide too.
Roland turns back and walks into the darkness behind the storage room.
You have a lot of unfinished works, Miss Voodoo.
Now that the guest and the target are brought together. How do you want to end this...?
